title: Fix #5 offline support.
message:
Fix #5 offline support.
[#] Renamed "DB" -> "Cache" (because we didn't use a database but cache files instead).
[+] Saved info to cache after logging in, and after fetching characters.
[+] Retrieved info from cache when logging in if there's a connection problem during an API request.
[+] In offline mode, disabled online operations with an error message.
[+] Auto-logging to the API on the fly when the connection suddenly comes back while the app was offline.
[+] Remove cache files when logging out.
[Fix] Better error handling when the API is down (i.e. when it doesn't send back an error but simply an empty response) -> disabling login (even in offline mode because the behavior is too random).
